name: Lazy load images and background images
author: jahidcse

sections.description:
Lazy load images and background images plugin has built in automatic support for images and background lazy load. You can lazy load thumbnails, all images in a post content or in a widget text, avatars. No JavaScript library such as jQuery is used and the script weight is less than 7KB. Decreasing page load time by progressive loading of images and background images.

AFFECT THESE ELEMENTS:

  1. IMG Elements
  2. Background images
  3. Iframe (Upcoming)

Notes

Lazy load images and background images is the easy way to speed up your website.
sections.installation:
1. Install Lazy load images and background images by uploading the background-and-image-lazy-load directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate Lazy load images and background images through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. You can change this option any time you want by going to the LazyLoad Settings Admin Menu.
sections.faq:
Can I use Lazy load images and background images for speed optimization?

Yes.

Can I use Lazy load images and background images for elementor background ?

Yes.
